name: soft-jobs-fullstack
description: Proyecto Full Stack para SoftJobs - Backend y Frontend
author: Patricia Zepeda

scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
